name: ifcli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), c2), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(if(w0, c0, c1)∈ c2, c0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), c2)
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), c2)
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), c2)
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c2)

comment: Inference associated with ~ ifcl . Membership (closure) of a conditional operator. Also usable to keep a membership hypothesis for the weak deduction theorem ~ dedth when the special case ` B e. C ` is provable. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1999.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 1-Sep-2022.)
